author: Adam Wells
title: Jon Jones Says 'I Got Stir Crazy' on Police Body Cam Video of DWI Arrest
description: UFC light heavyweight champion Jon Jones told police officers before being arrested that he was getting "stir crazy" sitting at his house when he decided to drive his car...
content:
Ronald Martinez/Getty Images
UFC light heavyweight champion Jon Jones told police officers before being arrested that he was getting "stir crazy" sitting at his house when he decided to drive his car.  
Police body camera footage obtained by MMA Junkie's No… [+1557 chars]
